document.full_text: a united nations report found that general ponce ordered the killings of six priests who had been suspected of sympathizing with the country's leftist rebel movement.
document.title: ren?? emilio ponce, salvadoran general accused in priests' murders, dies at 64
lines_and_colors: a united nations report found that general ponce ordered the killings of six priests who had been suspected of sympathizing with the country's leftist rebel movement.
